title: [1508521049] Pork Neck Curry with Mango Salsa - Gordon Ramsay
description:
A curry dish that's bursting with flavour. Tender diced pork served with a spicy Mango Salsa. Easy to make and absolutely delicious. 

Subscribe for weekly cooking videos. 

If you liked this clip check out the rest of Gordon's channels:

http://www.youtube.com/gordonramsay
http://www.youtube.com/kitchennightmares
http://www.youtube.com/thefword
